name: The Crying Mermaid
description:
#2 of sneakymoon's weekly crude mini game series

I've decided to make mini games every week, as a way to take a break from a bigger game I'm currently working on. This week's game is also a remake of an old idea from University (like FIND LOVE).

a mermaid is crying :( play as a tube and try to catch as  many tears as you can without getting destroyed!

sfx, crying woman sfx
